Description:
Construct Alice's deck using the rules on page 45 of the campaign guide.
Her deck consists of:
- 12 cards matching Fragments of Alice
- 3 copies of Shadow Strain
- 1 card from each of the remaining 9 bags based
  on resolutions in the campaign log
Draw until Alice has 3 cards during upkeep.
Play 1 card at the start of the investigator phase.
Name: Notecard
